quote_first:
McMurphy is whispering and nudging the Acutes sitting around him, and in a minute they all nod, and he lays three dollars on the table and leans back. Everybody turns in his chair and watches that butter sneak on down the wall, starting, hanging still, shooting ahead and leaving a shiny trail behind it on the pain. Nobody says a word. They look at the butter, then at the clock, then back at the butter. The clock’s moving now.
The butter makes it down to the floor about a half
quote_last: , and McMurphy gets back all the money he lost.
title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest
author: Ken Kesey

quote_last: in the morning of 1 July, the cinematographer finds himself filming silence itself.
title: At Break of Day
author: Elizabeth Speller
